clinical_study.brief_title: PK/PD Investigation of Modufolin® in Plasma, Tumor and Adjacent Mucosa Adjacent Mucosa in Patients With Colon Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Blind, Randomized Phase I/II Study of Pharmacokinetic and Pharmacodynamic Investigation of Modufolin® (60 or 200mg/m2) Compared to Levoleucovorin (60 or 200mg/m2) in Tumor, Adjacent Mucosa and Plasma for Patients With Colon Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare the concentration of four different metabolites in the tumor, in adjacent mucosa and in plasma in patients with colon cancer receiving two different doses of Modufolin® and Levoleucovorin (Isovorin®), respectively (60 and 200 mg/m2).

detailed_description.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare the concentration of [6R] 5,10-methylene-THF, 5-formyl-THF, 5-methyl-THF and THF in the tumor, in adjacent mucosa and in plasma in patients with colon cancer receiving two different does of Modufolin® and Levoleucovorin (Isovorin®), respectively (60 and 200 mg/m2).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Sample taken Day 1 (Day of Surgery)
secondary_outcome.description: Concentration of different genes involved in folate transport and metabolism were analysed in both tumor and adjacent mucosa. The concentration in mucosa was divided by the concentration in tumor. A value above 1 indicate that the gene expression was higher in mucosa than in tumor and a value below 1 that the gene expression was higher in tumor than in mucosa.

secondary_outcome.measure: Correlation of Gene Expression in Tumor and Adjacent Mucosa
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Sample taken Day 1 (Day of Surgery)
secondary_outcome.description: Concentration of the gene expression was analysed in both tumor and adjacent mucosa. The presence of any correlation between the results (i.e., concentration of the gene expression in tumor versus adjacent mucosa) was evaluated for each treatment. No evaluation was done between treatments.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Samples taken at Screening visit, Day 2, and End of Study (Day 5)
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples for folate biomarker (homocystein) analysis were collected at Screening, Day 2, and Day 5 (End of study visit).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Samples taken at Screening visit, Day 2 and End of Study (Day 5)
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples for folate biomarker (S-folate) analysis were collected at Screening, Day 2 and Day 5 (End of study visit).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Homocystein Concentration From Screening
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Samples taken at Screening visit, Day 2 and End of Study (Day 5)
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples for folate biomarker (homocystein) analysis were collected at Screening, Day 2 and Day 5 (End of study visit). Changes from screening to later visits were counted. The criteria for assessment categories "normal", "low" and "high" were based on the reference ranges for plasma-Homocystein as follows: "low" <4,7 mcmol/L; "normal" => 4,7 and <=16 mcmol/L; "high" >16 mcmol/L. Values were applicable for both male and female adults.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in S-Folate Concentration From Screening
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Samples taken at Screening visit, Day 2 and End of Study (Day 5)
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples for folate biomarker (S-folate) analysis were collected at Screening, Day 2 and Day 5 (End of study visit). Changes from screening to later visits were counted.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening visit until end of study, Day 5
secondary_outcome.description: Number of reported AEs per treatment with respect to severity

arm_group.description: One i.v. bolus injection of study drug after the patient has been anaesthetized.

criteria.textblock:
Main Inclusion Criteria:
- Operable colon cancer amenable to curative surgery.
- Performance status of 0 to 1
- Informed consent form
- Patients must be at least 18 years of age.
Main Exclusion Criteria:
- Any concurrent other anti-tumor therapy
- Any prohibited concomitant medication within 30 days of surgery
- Pregnancy or breast-feeding.
- Second primary malignancy

outcome.description: Correlation between the exposure of [6R]-5,10-methylene-THF following 2 hours after dosing (AUC[0-2h]) and the concentration of [6R]-5,10-methylene-THF in the tumor or adjacent mucosa at surgery.

outcome.population: The Per Protocol analysis set contained 29 of the 32 enrolled patients. One patient was withdrawn prior to study drug administration and two patients were excluded due to major protocol deviations.

outcome.title: Gene Expression Ratios (Mucosa:Tumor)
outcome.description: Concentration of different genes involved in folate transport and metabolism were analysed in both tumor and adjacent mucosa. The concentration in mucosa was divided by the concentration in tumor. A value above 1 indicate that the gene expression was higher in mucosa than in tumor and a value below 1 that the gene expression was higher in tumor than in mucosa.
outcome.time_frame: Sample taken Day 1 (Day of Surgery)
outcome.population: The Per Protocol analysis set contained 29 of the 32 enrolled patients. One patient was withdrawn prior to study drug administration and two patients were excluded due to major protocol deviations.

measure.title: Gene Expression Ratios (Mucosa:Tumor)
measure.description: Concentration of different genes involved in folate transport and metabolism were analysed in both tumor and adjacent mucosa. The concentration in mucosa was divided by the concentration in tumor. A value above 1 indicate that the gene expression was higher in mucosa than in tumor and a value below 1 that the gene expression was higher in tumor than in mucosa.
measure.population: The Per Protocol analysis set contained 29 of the 32 enrolled patients. One patient was withdrawn prior to study drug administration and two patients were excluded due to major protocol deviations.

outcome.title: Correlation of Gene Expression in Tumor and Adjacent Mucosa
outcome.description: Concentration of the gene expression was analysed in both tumor and adjacent mucosa. The presence of any correlation between the results (i.e., concentration of the gene expression in tumor versus adjacent mucosa) was evaluated for each treatment. No evaluation was done between treatments.
outcome.time_frame: Sample taken Day 1 (Day of Surgery)
outcome.population: The Per Protocol analysis set contained 29 of the 32 enrolled patients. One patient was withdrawn prior to study drug administration and two patients were excluded due to major protocol deviations.

outcome.title: Change in Homocystein Concentration From Screening
outcome.description: Blood samples for folate biomarker (homocystein) analysis were collected at Screening, Day 2 and Day 5 (End of study visit). Changes from screening to later visits were counted. The criteria for assessment categories "normal", "low" and "high" were based on the reference ranges for plasma-Homocystein as follows: "low" <4,7 mcmol/L; "normal" => 4,7 and <=16 mcmol/L; "high" >16 mcmol/L. Values were applicable for both male and female adults.
outcome.time_frame: Samples taken at Screening visit, Day 2 and End of Study (Day 5)
outcome.population: The Per Protocol analysis set contained 29 of the 32 enrolled patients. One patient was withdrawn prior to study drug administration and two patients were excluded due to major protocol deviations.

Values were applicable for both male and female adults.
